statements: SELECT * FROM LivestockData LIMIT 5
SELECT animal_name, animal_species FROM LivestockData ORDER BY weight_gain DESC
SELECT animal_name, weight_gain FROM LivestockData WHERE animal_species = 'Cow'
SELECT * FROM LivestockData ORDER BY animal_species ASC, weight_gain DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_records FROM LivestockData
SELECT * FROM LivestockData WHERE animal_species = 'Cow' ORDER BY animal_name ASC, weight_gain DESC
SELECT animal_name, weight_gain, feed_conversion_ratio FROM LivestockData WHERE weight_gain > 100 ORDER BY weight_gain DESC
SELECT animal_species, COUNT(*) AS total_count, AVG(weight_gain) AS avg_weight FROM LivestockData GROUP BY animal_species HAVING AVG(weight_gain) > 50 ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT * FROM LivestockData WHERE feed_conversion_ratio BETWEEN 2.0 AND 3.0 ORDER BY feed_conversion_ratio DESC
SELECT animal_name, animal_species, CONCAT(animal_name, ' - ', animal_species) AS animal_description FROM LivestockData WHERE weight_gain < 50 ORDER BY animal_name ASC
SELECT species, weight_kg FROM LivestockData
SELECT age_months, species FROM LivestockData
SELECT * FROM LivestockData WHERE weight_kg > 100
SELECT livestock_id, feed_converted_kg FROM LivestockData
SELECT weight_before, weight_after FROM WeightGain
SELECT * FROM LivestockData WHERE species = 'Cow';
SELECT livestock_id, species, weight_kg FROM LivestockData WHERE age_months > 24 ORDER BY weight_kg DESC;
SELECT species, AVG(weight_kg) AS avg_weight FROM LivestockData GROUP BY species HAVING AVG(weight_kg) > 1000;
SELECT species, SUM(feed_converted_kg) AS total_feed FROM LivestockData WHERE age_months <= 12 GROUP BY species;
SELECT l.*, w.date, w.weight_before, w.weight_after FROM LivestockData l INNER JOIN WeightGain w ON l.livestock_id = w.livestock_id WHERE w.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Livestock WHERE animal_type='Cattle';
SELECT * FROM Livestock WHERE weight_kg > 200;
SELECT id, animal_type, weight_kg FROM Livestock ORDER BY weight_kg DESC;
SELECT AVG(weight_gain_kg) FROM WeightGain WHERE livestock_id=1;
SELECT DISTINCT animal_type FROM Livestock;
SELECT * FROM Livestock WHERE weight_kg > 100 ORDER BY date_birth DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT animal_type, weight_kg FROM Livestock WHERE date_sold IS NULL;
SELECT livestock_id, SUM(weight_gain_kg) AS total_weight_gain FROM WeightGain GROUP BY livestock_id HAVING total_weight_gain > 50 ORDER BY total_weight_gain DESC;
SELECT l.id, l.animal_type, w.weight_gain_kg FROM Livestock l JOIN WeightGain w ON l.id = w.livestock_id WHERE w.date_recorded >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY l.id, w.date_recorded DESC;

SELECT l.id, l.animal_type, AVG(c.conversion_ratio) AS avg_conversion_ratio FROM Livestock l JOIN FeedConversion c ON l.id = c.livestock_id WHERE c.date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY l.id ORDER BY avg_conversion_ratio DESC;
SELECT * FROM Livestock;
SELECT id, animal_type FROM Livestock ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT animal_type, weight FROM Livestock WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeightGain INNER JOIN Livestock ON WeightGain.livestock_id = Livestock.id WHERE measurement_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT farm_name, location, established_date FROM LivestockFarm WHERE established_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY established_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Livestock;
SELECT animal_type, weight FROM Livestock WHERE weight > 200;
SELECT farm_name, location FROM LivestockFarm WHERE established_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT livestock_id, weight_gain FROM WeightGain ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT livestock_id, SUM(feed_consumed) AS total_feed_consumed FROM FeedConversionRatio GROUP BY livestock_id;
SELECT * FROM Livestock;
SELECT animal_type, weight FROM Livestock WHERE age > 5;
SELECT id, animal_type, age FROM Livestock ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT animal_type, weight, age FROM Livestock WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY weight ASC;
SELECT id, animal_type, weight, age FROM Livestock WHERE age BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM Livestock WHERE animal_type = 'Cow';
SELECT * FROM Livestock ORDER BY age DESC, weight ASC;

SELECT f.location_name, l.animal_type, w.weight FROM FarmLocation f JOIN FarmLivestock fl ON f.id = fl.farm_id JOIN Livestock l ON fl.livestock_id = l.id JOIN WeightGain w ON l.id = w.livestock_id WHERE w.weight > 100 ORDER BY f.location_name, w.weight DESC;
SELECT l.animal_type, AVG(w.feed_amount) AS avg_feed_amount FROM Livestock l JOIN FeedConversionRatio w ON l.id = w.livestock_id GROUP BY l.animal_type HAVING avg_feed_amount > 5;

SELECT l.animal_type, COUNT(*) AS livestock_count FROM FarmLivestock fl JOIN Livestock l ON fl.livestock_id = l.id GROUP BY l.animal_type HAVING livestock_count > 3 ORDER BY livestock_count DESC, l.animal_type;
